subject: NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Matthew Peca recorded the fastest hat trick in N.C.A.A. tournament history, scoring three goals in 3 minutes 12 seconds to lead top-seeded Quinnipiac.
snippet: Matthew Peca recorded the fastest hat trick in N.C.A.A. tournament history, scoring three goals in 3 minutes 12 seconds to lead top-seeded Quinnipiac.
